programme.title: Flesh Eaters
programme.desc: A group of young adults trapped on a desert island find the water inhabited by a violent form of flesh-eating organisms.

programme.title: Munchies
programme.desc: An archaeologist finds a strange creature in Peru and takes it home. He dubs the creature a `Munchie', but is unprepared for the ensuing chaos when the beast starts to mutate.

programme.title: Neon Maniacs
programme.desc: A group of teenagers in San Francisco discover a nest of homicidal monsters living in a tower of the Golden Gate Bridge, but when they try to tell authorities, no one believes them.

programme.title: Willard
programme.desc: A social misfit uses his only friends, his pet rats, to exact revenge on his tormentors.

programme.title: Ben
programme.desc: Ben the rat returns to lead a violent rodent army in this 1972 horror sequel to "Willard."

programme.title: A Fantastic Fear of Everything
programme.desc: A crime novelist whose research on Victorian serial killers has turned him into a paranoid wreck must confront his worst fears when a film executive takes a sudden interest in his movie script.

programme.title: White Zombie
programme.desc: A young man turns to a witch doctor to lure the woman he loves away from her fiance, but instead turns her into a zombie slave.

programme.title: Undead (2003)
programme.desc: A quaint fishing village is overcome by meteorites that turn its residents into the undead.

programme.title: Hell Night
programme.desc: Four college pledges are forced to spend the night in a deserted old mansion, where they are stalked by the monstrous survivor of a family massacre years earlier.

programme.title: A Dragonfly for Each Corpse
programme.desc: A killer is cleaning up the streets of Milan by murdering those considered as deviant. An ornamental dragonfly, soaked in the blood of the victim, is left on each body.

programme.title: The Last Man On Earth
programme.desc: When a disease turns all of humanity into the living dead, the last man on earth becomes a reluctant vampire hunter.

programme.title: Straight On Till Morning
programme.desc: A timid, withdrawn woman meets a man she believes is finally the love of her life, unaware that he is a vicious serial killer.

programme.title: Ed And His Dead Mother
programme.desc: A mourning son makes a deal to reanimate his one year dead mother.

programme.title: The Ninth Configuration
programme.desc: A military psychiatrist takes charge of an army mental hospital situated in a secluded castle filled with eccentric patients.
